data.title: DPS – Criminal Identification (BCI)
data.text:
Utah's Missing Persons List

Elizabeth Jewel Green

Elizabeth was last seen wearing a tie dye hoodie, light blue pair of jeans, black converse sneakers and had a white backpack purse. Please contact Juab County Sheriff’s Office with any information 435-856-0358

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Kaya Lee Birch

Case Type: Missing Person

Date Last Seen: 01/19/2023

Date of Birth: 11/18/1992

Eyes: Green

Hair: Brown

Height: 5’6′

Weight: 110lbs

Identifying Features: Multiple Tattoos: Left upper arm, Right hand, Left forearm, and neck.

Please contact South Salt Lake PD with any information

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Kandis Rose Harris

Kandis was last seen in Salt lake City, UT. She has a Marilyn Monroe piercing/scar on her right side. If you have any information please contact the Salt Lake City PD.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Jamison Nathaniel Gordon

Jamison Nathaniel Gordon was last seen in Orem Utah on 01/14/2021. He was diagnosed with schizophrenia, is suicidal and depressed. He was last seen wearing a hoodie and running pants, he wears glasses and might be carrying a backpack with Asian flower type design in black and white. If seen please contact Orem City Police at 801-229-7070.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Vern Richard Morris

Vern Richard Morris was last seen in Tooele Utah on 06/25/2021. He is diabetic and requires insulin. He was last seen wearing baggie blue jeans bunched at at the waist, black or black and grey socks, and black shoes. His right front tooth is chipped, and has a appendectomy scar. If seen please contact Tooele City Police Department at (435) 840-4098.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Dwayne Dutton

Dwayne’s vehicle was located in the are of Squaw Peak on April 23, 2007. It is believed Dwayne went hiking in the area, and has not been seen since. Dwayne was reported to be familiar with several caves in the area.

Orem Department of Public Safety (801) 229-7070

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Lucero Jimenez

Lucero Jimenez ran away from home on 4/7/2009 after leaving for school in the morning. It is believed she is now in Mexico, authorities have not been able to confirm this. Multiple sources have confirmed this, but contact with Lucero has yet to be made.

West Valley Police Det. Haywood (801) 965-5320

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Jose Antonio Sisco Ramirez

Jose Antonio Ramirez was last seen with his mother on or about January 26th, 2006. Jose was last seen with his mother Irma Jose Fina Ramierez Perez when she was granted a 15 day visitation to the United States and Utah. Irma and Jose Antonio have not been seen since arriving in the U.S.their whereabouts is unknown and anyone with information is asked to reach out.

West Valley Police Det. Haywood (801) 965-5320

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Isai Garcia

Isai Garcia ran away from home in the midnight hours on 8/20/2012. He left the house in the family vehicle and packed his bags. His vehicle was later recovered and sold to new owners without their knowledge of any previous concerns over the vehicle.Three month later it is believed that Isai was attempting to return to the U.S. from Mexico with his girlfriend but was denied entry at the boarder. His whereabouts are still unknown.

West Valley City Police (801) 840-4000

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Haruchika Miyagi

On December 5, 2015, around 5 pm, a resident in the 17000 block of Med Bar Road, off of Orme Road outside Dewey Arizona, called to report a trespasser. The Man, later identified as Haruchika Miyagi told her he was looking for a place to stay and she declined to allow him to remain on her property. Haruchika sped away in the Red Mazda Sedan and crashed through a gate before leaving the property. Deputies found the Mazda two hours later in a wash near the Med Bar Road property. It was abandoned and heavily damaged. Friends and family reported Haruchika missing as they were concerned becuase he did not show up for work. His family does not know why he went to Arizona. A search and follow-up with local hospitals has been unsuccessful. Haruchika may have a cell phone with him, but recent checks indicate it is off.

Contact American Fork Police (801) 763-3020

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Frank Wilson Johnson

Missing during 1961 Flash Flood in the Virgin River

https://www.foxnews.com/us/skull-linked-to-ut-scout-missing-since-1961-flood

Contact Springdale Police Department 435-634-5730

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Frederick Gabriel

Frederick was listed as a missing person. He left his home in Lehi after a disagreement with his girlfriend. His vehicle was located in San Jan County. He has never been seen or heard from since.

San Jan County Sheriff’s (435) 587-2237

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Frank Joseph Veruchhi

Draper police are asking for help in locating missing person, Frank Veruchhi. Frank has not been heard from since April 17, 2016. He lives in Suncrest and likes to hike tin that area. Franks vehicle and ID were left at his house. Contact Draper Police if you have any information.

Draper Police Department (801) 840-4000

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Jose Amado Falcon

In December of 2017, Jose Falcon was reported to the Sheriff’s Office as a Missing Person. His Girlfriend reported he was gone when she returned home, with no indication where he had gone. He left his home in Winchester Hills driving a Gold Saturn passenger car. The vehicle was later located unoccupied in Las Vegas, Nevada. There has been no additional information in the case since that time.

Washington County Sheriffs Office Tip Line: (435) 656-6644

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Erlin Contreras

Erlin was in states custody when he ran away. His family family lives in Honduras. It is believed he may have traveled there. Contact the South Salt Lake Police.

South Salt Lake Police (801) 412-3600

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Russell Hanks

Russell left his home early in the morning on 10/6/2018. He was seen on surveillance camera’s on neighboring homes leaving at 5:36 AM. He left with a small backpack. He was captured on another surveillance camera walking towards the desert south west of St. George. This is an area that he hikes frequently. This was the last time Mr. Hanks was seen.

St. George City Police 435-627-4301

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Robert Trujillo

Ogden City Police Dept (801) 629-8438

On 10/24/2013 at 1630 hours, Robert left a home he shares with his Grandmother to go to a Jujitsu class. Robert never arrived at the class and has not been seen since. Robert’s car was found locked up and abandoned near the Causey Reservoir in Weber County, Utah on 10/27/2013.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Michael Sheftell

San Juan County Sheriff’s Office (435) 587-2237

Michael’s Jeep was found overturned on 6/11/16. He was found walking along Anticline Overlook Rd. Michael was picked by a couple who took him back to his campsite. He was then last seen walking towards trail 38c.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Andrei Campana

Woods Cross Police Department (801) 292-4422 Sgt. Chris Hoffman

Andrei left home on Sunday, 11/12/2017 at 1:35 pm and his car was found around 3 pm on that same day at the Mueller Park entrance. He was wearing a blue fleece pullover, a black North Face jacket and khaki pants. He may have also been wearing hiking boots, Keen brand, size 10.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Melvin Heaps

Summit County Sheriff Lt. Alan Siddoway (435) 615-3610

Mr. Heaps went hiking in the Crystal Lake area of the Wasatch National Forest, Summit County, Utah. He did not return home as planned and his vehicle was located at the trailhead. Hw was last known wearing Long sleeve red/rust with beige stripes, size 15.5-16/32 possibly Van Heusen bran; Blue trousers, size 38/30 zippered fly possibly Faded Glory or Wrangler brand; Elastic, clip on suspenders; LDS one-piece undergarments. Brown hiking boots Size 9.5-10; Thick multi-colored socks and an unknown brand analog watch with a leather band. Gun metal gray wire-framed prescription eyeglass that auto tint with clip-on flip up sunglasses and White handkerchief; Hearing aid in right ear; Brown leather wallet and contents; Chapstick; Toyota key and fob.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Joseph Santi

Contact the Salt Lake City Police Department 801-799-3454

Joe Santi was last seen on Saturday evening, January 22, 1977 and is missing under suspicious circumstances. His hair was graying and balding.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Ayyub Pugh

Contact the Layton Police Department (801) 336-3453

Ayyub Pugh was residing with family at an address in Layton Utah. He walked away from the address and has not been seen or heard from since 2010. Ayyub has been in New York and Florida prior to residing in Utah. Ayyub is a mental health patient and may possibly seek or be involuntarily committed to mental health facilities. Last known wearing Beige shirt and dress pants. He was carrying a bible.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Curtis Crosby

Contact the South Salt Lake Police Department (801) 412-3600

May seem disorientated. Wandered from established residence and may be living among the homeless. Believed to have perhaps some sort of memory loss. Does not have any identification on his person. He did a lot of advocacy work with the Katrina evacuees. Last seen with tan pants and a black hoodie and was barefoot. He has medium length hair, slicked back, and partially balding and may have a mustache or beard.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Mark Johnston

Contact Sandy City Police Department (801) 568-7288

Mark was last seen at work on 10/11/2016. It is believed that he accessed his bank account on 10/12/2016. He left his computer, cell phone, identification, and additional personal items at home. He was last known wearing grey dress pants and had a blue and grey striped shirt on. He has a scar on his left knee and has had his appendix removed.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Kenneth Starbuck

Syracuse Police Department (801) 825-4400

Kenneth has a brain injury and a seizure disorder. Unknown destination.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Macin Smith

St. George Police Department (435) 627-4325

Macin was last seen on 9/1/2015 before he left for school. Macin was believed to be wearing basketball shorts with a t-shirt.He may still be in the local area or he may travel to Las Vegas, Nevada.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Nancy Wilcox

Contact Unified Police 385-468-9816 Det. Pender

Nancy Wilcox was a 16 year-old cheerleader in her junior year at Olympus High School at the time of her disappearance. She was last seen riding with a man in a yellow Volkswagen Bug near her home in Holladay, Utah on the afternoon of October 2, 1974.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Susan Curtis

Contact BYU Police (801) 422-5208

Susan was from Bountiful. She was attending the Bountiful Orchard Youth Conference at Brigham Young University in Provo, Utah when she disappeared.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Nancy Baird

Contact Davis County Sheriffs Office (801) 541-4100

Nancy was working as a clerk for a Fina gas station when she was found to be missing. She was last seen by a patrol officer approximately 15 minutes before her disappearance. She was wearing b shorts, halter top and a smock, all blue in color. The smock had a “Fina” station logo. Her purse and money were found behind the counter and her car was parked at the station. She was known to wear a small ruby ring on her pinky finger. This ring had a main ruby stone with two smaller rubies on each side. Set in gold.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Deborah Lee Carver

Contact Cedar City Police (435) 586-2956

Deborah was last seen in Cedar City Utah. Unknown direction of travel. She may be disoriented and confused. Suffers from early stage of dementia.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Rhonda Karren

Contact Uintah County Sheriffs Office (435) 789-2511

Rhonda was last seen at approximately 10:30p.m. after dropping off a co-worker at their residence in Salt Lake City, UT. It is believed she returned to her residence in Vernal, UT. The following day, she was to open the K-Mart store at 7:30am. She was reported missing on September 29th. There were signs of a struggle at her residence. Rhonda is considered a chain smoker, but left her cigarettes on the kitchen counter along with her purse, house and car keys. She was last seen wearing a sweater and black polyester slacks.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Tobey Baker

Contact Washington County Sheriffs Office (435) 656-6500.

Tobey Tweedy Baker was last seen on September 1, 2011 checking into a hotel room in St George, Utah.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Randall Irvin

Contact Washington County Sheriffs Office (435) 656-6500.

Randall went missing on 12-16-2011 from his home in Hurricane, Utah.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Rebecca Jane White

Contact South Salt Lake City Police Department (801) 412-3647.

Rebecca White went missing the summer of 2012. She has a tattoo of a “chain” around her right ankle and a tattoo on her abdomen. She also has pierced ears. Contact South Salt Lake Police with any information. NamUs# 28316

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Steven Willard Anderson

CONTACT: Unified Police of Greater Salt Lake 385-468-9816 Det. Pender

Missing since 6/3/04. Left to paint family cabin in Flaming Gorge. Dad checked at cabin and he had never arrived. Vehicle was a lease and neither vehicle or Steven were located. Any information contact the Unified Police of Greater Salt Lake.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Dennise Sullivan

Contact Grand County Sheriffs Office (435) 259-8115.

Dennise was on vacation with her mother and mother’s fiance in July 1961. They encountered an adult male who claimed he had car trouble. The adult male then demanded money from the adult couple and displayed a gun. After shooting both adults he forced the child into his vehicle and drove away. Contact Grand County Sheriffs Office with any information.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Stephen L Hughes

CONTACT: Bountiful Police Department (801) 298-6012.

Stephen’s truck was found abandoned at his place of business in Bountiful, Utah. He was last seen wearing a baseball cap and a red plaid shirt. He may have a mustache. He had shingles on his left side. He has heart problems and may be in need of medical attention. Contact Bountiful Police with any information.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Ruth Jimenez

Contact Sandy City Police Department (801) 568-7200.

Ruth disappeared under suspicious circumstances on July 1,1999. She has had dental work done to 2 of her upper front teeth with visible silver around the edges. She wears 4 earrings in each ear. Spanish speaking only. If you have any information please contact the Sandy City Police Department.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Michael Marsh

Contact Tooele City Police Department (Utah) 1-435-882-5600.

Michael was last seen on February 21, 2006. Michael may travel to California. He may wear glasses.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Steven Thell Koecher

CONTACT: St. George Police Department (435) 627-4300- Las Vegas Metropolitan Police Department Missing Persons at (702) 229-2907- Henderson Police Department at (702) 267-4750.

Steven was working in St. George Utah but his vehicle was located abandoned in Henderson Nevada. He has short hair and a unique birthmark on his abdomen. If you have any information please contact the St. George Police department or the Las Vegas Metropolitan Police Department Missing Persons at (702) 229-2907

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Raymond Dean Shurtz (Dean Shurtz)

CONTACT: Cedar City Utah Police Department (435) 586-2955

Raymond has Alzheimers, internal bleeding, and dementia. He was last seen in Fillmore, Utah on November 26, 2006. He was last seen wearing an orange cap with “Conoco” written on it, Levis, black jacket, and white tennis shoes. Raymond has a cyst on his right hand between the fingers. He may be headed to Escalante, Utah, Boulder, Utah or to Arizona. On December 1, 2005 Raymonds vehicle was located in the Valley of Fire State Park near Las Vegas, Nevada. Mr. Shurtz was not with the vehicle.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Joyce Yost

Contact South Ogden Police Department (801) 622-2800

Joyce was last seen in South Ogden, Utah on Aug. 10, 1985. She has not been seen or heard from since. Her car was later found abandoned in the foothill’s east of town. She has pierced ears and wore several gold chains. Unknown what she was wearing. If you have any information contact the South Ogden Police.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Ronald Howard Druce

Contact West Valley Police Department (801) 840-4000

It is unknown where Ronald may have traveled. If you have any information please contact the West Valley police (801) 840-4000

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Reed T. Jeppson

Contact Salt Lake City Police Department 801-799-3454

Reed was last seen in the vicinity of St. Mary of the Wasatch on the East bench of Salt Lake on October 11, 1964 walking his 2 German short hair pointers. He has not been heard from since. He was wearing blue levis, a white cotton knit shirt and a reversible parka (blue on one side and black on the other) Contact Salt Lake City Police with any information.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Sarah Norfleet

Contact Bountiful Police Department (801) 298-6050. Detective Shane Alexander

Sarah was last seen in Bountiful Utah. She may have traveled to Nevada or California with a male companion. She went missing without taking any clothing or personal effects. She has had jaw surgery and has surgical screws in her jaw. There has been no contact from Sarah since she went missing. Contact Bountiful Police with any information.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Deane David Brown

CONTACT: Salt Lake Police (801) 799-3000

MISSING ENDANGERED: Deane was last seen being dropped off at a parking lot located at 348 East South Temple on the night of October 23, 1986. He has not been seen since. He was last seen wearing a light blue business suit. DNA is available. Contact Salt Lake Police at (801) 799-3000 with any information

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Fred Richard Davis

CONTACT: Naples Police Department (435)-219-8252

MISSING ENDANGERED: Mr. Davis was last seen on 8/28/1985 and was supposed to meet family members in Jackson Hole Wyoming for a hunting trip, but never arrived. His vehicle, a beige C10 pickup was located September 19, 1985 in the parking lot of the Dunes Casino, Las Vegas, Nevada. The vehicle was unlocked, the windows were down, and the keys were in the truck.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Lakhbir Banwait aka: Lakhbir Singh

CONTACT: Salt Lake City police 801-799-3454

MISSING ENDANGERED: Last seen walking to the Post Office in downtown Salt Lake City, Utah. Moustache & Beard. Unknown scar on top of his head. Last seen wearing black pants, white shirt, unknown black shoes and wearing a sky blue colored turban on his head.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Trent Collier

CONTACT: Tooele County Sheriff’s office (435) 882-5600

MISSING ENDANGERED: No known direction of travel. Contact the Tooele County Sheriff’s office with any information

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Jesse Glen Pinegar

CONTACT: Orem Public Safety (801) 229-7070

MISSING ENDANGERED: Jesse left Utah to vacation in Hawaii and has not been seen or heard from since. He has a tattoo of a celtic tree of life on his right shoulder and a celtic boar on his left abdom. He has had a fracture on one of his arms and an ankle. Unknown. Contact Orem public safety at (801) 229-7070 or the Kauai County PD (808) 241-1711

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Darrel B. Nichols

CONTACT: Park City Police Department (435) 615-5500

MISSING ENDANGERED: Darrel may have been with friends in the hills of Park City. There has been no contact since 1973. He wears horned rimmed glasses. Contact Park City Police Department with any information

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

David Mathew Jaramillo

CONTACT: Salt Lake City Police Department 801-799-3454

MISSING ENDANGERED: David and 14 year old friend Lloyd Reese were last seen at East Canyon Reservoir when they were separated from other friends. David has not been seen since. He has a chipped front tooth and an unknown tattoo on his right hand. If you have any information contact the Salt Lake City (801) 799-3000

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Lloyd Michael Reese

CONTACT: Salt Lake City Police Department 801-799-3454

MISSING ENDANGERED: Lloyd and 21 year old David Jaramillo were last seen at East Canyon Reservoir when they were separated from other friends during the day. Lloyd has not been seen since. He has extremely bright white teeth, bright green eyes and braces on both top and bottom teeth. He has a mole on his right cheek and a scar on his upper right arm.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Toby James Jespersen

CONTACT: Utah Missing Persons Clearinghouse (801) 965-4686

MISSING ENDANGERED: Toby has his tongue, ears and nose pierced. His last know location is unknown. Please contact the Missing Persons Clearinghouse with any information

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Richard Roy Billmayer

CONTACT: Ogden City Police Dept 801-629-8067

MISSING ENDANGERED: Richard disappeared under suspicious circumstances. Several tattoos

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

David Bird Thomson (aka Bird)

CONTACT: Minnetonka Police Dept 952-939-8550

MISSING: Dave was last seen standing by Highway 7 and Williston Rd in Minnetonka. He had a back pack and no other belongings. After he was last seen he worked very briefly in Denver CO and Casper WY in 1979.

Dave was in a car accident in 1964 resulting in a fracture in his growth bone of left shoulder, foreshortening his left arm, serious left leg fracture resulting in leg being 3/8 of an inch shorter. Subsequent diagnosis of scoliosis.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Linda H. Peterson aka: Gustke and Hanoian

CONTACT: Murray City Police Department (801) 264-2673 after hrs (801) 840-4000

MISSING ENDANGERED: Linda wears glasses and has a scar on her cheek. She was 5 months pregnant at the time of her disappearance and was wearing an Orange maternity top and blue jeans.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Marlene Puchuskie

CONTACT: Unified Police of Greater Salt Lake 385-468-9816 Det. Pender

MISSING ENDANGERED: Marlene has been missing since June 1986. She has a scar on her left cheek, curly hair and has used the name Marlene Cummings. Dental is available.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

William McBride

CONTACT: Unified Police of Greater Salt Lake 385-468-9816 Det. Pender

MISSING ENDANGERED: May have traveled in the direction of Cedar City, Utah (photo taken in 1990)

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Harold William Galvis

CONTACT: Unified Police of Greater Salt Lake 385-468-9816 Det. Pender

MISSING PERSON – Harold has memory lapses and sometimes does not know where he is. He has been missing since August 28, 2001. Contact the Unified Police of Greater Salt Lake with any information.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Steven Anderson

CONTACT: Unified Police of Greater Salt Lake (801) 743-7000

MISSING PERSON – Steven was last seen on June 3, 2004. He may be driving a Green Toyota. Any information contact the Unified Police of Greater Salt Lake.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Susan Powell

CONTACT: West Valley City Police Department (801) 840-4000

MISSING ENDANGERED: Susan Powell is 5 feet 4 inches tall and weighs about 130 pounds, with brown hair and blue eyes. If anyone has any information about her whereabouts, you’re asked to call the West Valley Police Department at 801-840-4000

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Lark Loraine Montague

CONTACT: Unified Police of Greater Salt Lake 385-468-9816 Det. Pender

MISSING ENDANGERED Adult: Lark was last seen on September 21, 2007 driving a silver 2002 Chevy Blazer with Utah license plates. If you have seen Lark, please contact the Unified Police of Greater Salt Lake (801) 743-7000

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Timothy Scott Parry AKA: Tim

CONTACT: Iron County Sheriff’s Office (435) 867-7500

MISSING ENDANGERED w/DISABILITY: Timothy disappeared from his home in Cedar City, Utah. He has several medical conditions, including epilepsy, Angelman’s Syndrome or happy puppet syndrome. He has brain damage that causes him to be un-balanced. When frightened he will scream and shake his hands. His face peels under his eyes and he has porferia, an allergy to the sun. Possible birth mark on his left inner thigh. Timothy has burn scars on the palms of both hands

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Adam Hutchinson

CONTACT: Sandy City Police Department (801) 568-7200

MISSING ENDANGERED: Adam was last seen wearing a black shirt and black pants. He has tattoos on his back, left shoulder, right and left arm and his chest. He has a scar on his left arm. Contact the Sandy Police Department with any information.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Mary K Miller

CONTACT: Utah County Sheriff’s Office 801 851-4000

MISSING ENDANGERED Adult: Mary was last seen on June 20, 1979. She was emotionally upset at the time she disappeared. She had a bridge on her upper front teeth.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Jeffrey Lynn O’Carroll

CONTACT: Salt Lake City Police Department 801-799-3454

MISSING ENDANGERED Adult w/DISABILITIES: Jeffrey was last heard from on August 27th 1986. He has a mental condition and requires medication for schizophrenia. He does not drive and would have left on foot. He wears glasses with dark grey or wine colored lenses and has “messy” hair. He could have been wearing a light grey shirt and dark grey pants. May have a beard but does have a widows peak. He has a cleft dimple on his chin and has a burn scar on his lower right leg below his knee. He also has a skin graph scar above his knee on his right leg. Dental and chest x-rays are available.

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Robert G. Marvin AKA: Bob Marvin

CONTACT: Moab City Police Department (435) 259-8938

MISSING ENDANGERED Adult: Robert was last seen on 9/4/1984 driving from Moab, Utah to Albuquerqe, New Mexico. His vehicle was later discovered in New Mexico but Robert has not been seen or heard from since. He was last seen wearing a short sleeve shirt, brown khaki shorts and brown shoes. He had a fractured right leg that may have left a curve or lumps in his leg. If you have any information about Robert’s disappearance, please contact the Moab Police Department (435) 259-8938

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Daniel C. Edmonds Jr. AKA: Charles D Edmonds Jr

CONTACT: Salem Police Department (801) 423-2770

MISSING ENDANGERED Adult: Charles Edmonds was last seen on August 22, 1995. He was last known to be wearing a white baseball cap, leaf green jacket with tan sleeves (name was on coat), blue “marlboro” shirt, blue Levis, brown belt and was wearing High-Tec boots. He had scars on both his knees. There has been no contact with family and/or friends since his dissapearance. Photo was taken in 1994. Any information on Daniel, please contact the Salem Police Department (801) 423-2770

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Daniel Leon Scott

CONTACT: Murray Police Department (801) 264-2673

MISSING ENDANGERED: Daniel has been missing since January 1, 1997 under suspicious circumstances. Please contact the Murray City Police Department with any information

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Garrett Alexander Bardsley

CONTACT: Summit County Sheriff’s Office (435) 615-3600

MISSING ENDANGERED: Garrett was last seen on August 20, 2004 in the Cuberant Lake area in the high Uinta Mountains of Utah. He was last seen wearing a black hooded sweat shirt, red sweat pants, t-shirt, and Converse shoes size 7 to 8. He has straight shoulder length hair and a gap between his front teeth. Any information on the location of Garrett, contact the Summit County Sheriff’s Office at (435) 615-3600

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Jeff Nichols

CONTACT: Salt Lake City Police Department 801-799-3454

MISSING ENDANGERED Adult: Jeffrey Dale Nichols disappeared under suspicious circumstances on June 8, 2004. He was supposed to meet his ex-wife and 7-year-old son for breakfast at a McDonalds in Midvale but never arrived and hasn’t been seen since. Jeff’s vehicle, a white 2000 Ford Ranger, was towed from the 4800 South State Street block on July 15. DNA available

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Acacia Patience Bishop

CONTACT: Unified Police of Greater Salt Lake 385-468-9816 Det. Pender

FAMILY ABDUCTION: Acacia was last seen wearing a pink sundress with white sunflowers. Both of her ears are pierced and she has a tennis ball-sized birthmark on her lower left abdomen. Acacia Patience Bishop was kidnapped from her great-grandmother’s home in Salt Lake City, Utah on May 25, 2003 by her mentally ill grandmother. Acacia Bishop was last seen at 6 p.m. that day. The grand mother claims she drowned the baby in the Snake River in a failed suicide/homicide attempt. Photo is an age progressed

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Jason Wayne Dennis

CONTACT: St. George Police Department at 435 634-5000

MISSING ENDANGERED: Jason may have traveled to Salt Lake City, Utah, Nevada, or to the Southern California area. He is suicidal and took a 22-cal Jennings handgun with him. SER NUM 361538SEE

Help find this person. Share through your social media network:

Douglas P Plummer

CONTACT: Unified Police of Greater Salt Lake 385-468-9816 Det. Pender

MISSING ENDANGERED: Douglas was last seen on 1/17/2001 at his place of employment in Salt Lake City. He lives in Taylorsville, Utah. He is blind in his left eye and wears glasses.
